ldap_sort

(PHP 4 >= 4.2.0, PHP 5)

ldap_sort — Sort LDAP result entries

Description

bool ldap_sort ( resource $link , resource $result , string $sortfilter )
Warning

This function is currently not documented; only its argument list is available.
